quote: Trapped on a school bus for an hour each morning and each evening, she devoured book after book. She explored a hundred worlds, indifferent to her peers and the passing of the universe.
quote_letters: TRAPPED ON A SCHOOL BUS FOR AN HOUR EACH MORNING AND EACH EVENING SHE DEVOURED BOOK AFTER BOOK SHE EXPLORED A HUNDRED WORLDS INDIFFERENT TO HER PEERS AND THE PASSING OF THE UNIVERSE
